import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import Header from '../components/Header' import Aurhor from '../components/Author' import '../public/style/pages/index.css' import { Row, Col, List } from 'antd' import { HourglassOutlined, YoutubeOutlined, FireOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const Home = (list) => { const [mylist, setList] = useState(list.data) return (
Home

} dataSource={mylist} itemLayout='vertical' renderItem={item =>
{item.title}
{item.addTime} {item.typeName} {item.view_count}
{item.introduce}
} /> ) } Home.getInitialProps = async () => { const promise = new Promise(resolve => { axios('http://127.0.0.1:7001/default/getArticleList').then(res => { resolve(res.data) }) }) return await promise } export default Home
